methods.name: public Builder setUserSecretType(@UserSecretType int userSecretType)
methods.comment:
* Sets user secret type.
         * Default value is {@link TYPE_LOCKSCREEN}.
         *
         * @see TYPE_LOCKSCREEN
         * @param userSecretType The secret type
         * @return This builder.

methods.name: public Builder setLockScreenUiFormat(@LockScreenUiFormat int lockScreenUiFormat)
methods.comment:
* Sets UI format.
         *
         * @see UI_FORMAT_PIN
         * @see UI_FORMAT_PASSWORD
         * @see UI_FORMAT_PATTERN
         * @param lockScreenUiFormat The UI format
         * @return This builder.

methods.name: public Builder setKeyDerivationParams(@NonNull KeyDerivationParams keyDerivationParams)
methods.comment:
* Sets parameters of the key derivation function.
         *
         * @param keyDerivationParams Key derivation parameters
         * @return This builder.

methods.name: public Builder setSecret(@NonNull byte[] secret)
methods.comment:
* Secret derived from user input, or empty array.
         *
         * @param secret The secret.
         * @return This builder.

methods.name: public KeyChainProtectionParams build()
methods.comment:
* Creates a new {@link KeyChainProtectionParams} instance.
         * The instance will include default values, if {@link #setSecret}
         * or {@link #setUserSecretType} were not called.
         *
         * @return new instance
         * @throws NullPointerException if some required fields were not set.
